# tg_gateway_config (Resource)

Node Gateway Config



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `node_id` (String) Node ID

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Gateway Enabled
- `host` (String) Host IP
- `port` (Number) Gateway Port
- `type` (String) Gateway Type

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
